Componitor
service in module componitor.service

Description

Parses and registers the directives for the found <componitor-template /> elements from the given html fragment.

Usage: Call #process for the html fragment. See example below for more.

Methods

  • _createDirective(name, templateHtml)

    NOT PART OF THE PUBLIC API

    Registers a componitor template directive with the $compileProvider. This method should be called before the html containing the usages of the templates is $compiled.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    namestring

    the camelCased angularjs-style representation of the directive-to-be's name

    templateHtmltext/html

    the contents of the <componitor-template /> block

  • _processTemplate(t)

    NOT PART OF THE PUBLIC API

    Parses the target <componitor-template /> element and registers it with _createDirective.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    ttext/html

    the element to parse

  • process(htmlToProcess)

    Processes the given html and registers the <componitor-template />s.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    htmlToProcesselement

    the html element to find the componitor-templates in.

Example
